aboutme.title: About me
aboutme.description: I am a full stack developer, I have worked in different projects with people from all over the world in order to develop solutions for clients, I like to work with other people to contribute ideas and build high quality code applying SOLID principles and design patterns for guarantee a maintainable and scalable code. I have worked in the development with different technologies. Many of the projects that I have worked on are private, others public, but the knowledge is always with me. You can see a sample of my code in my github account.
